questions.quote: Robin, listen to me. The most amazing thing has happened. Kramer has opened my eyes. I think I've changed.
Yeah buddy. You really came through for me man. You've been so nice.
Oh yeah yeah, don't you know they used pastrami in that movie 9? weeks? Remember the pastrami scene?
You know, I didn't go to the bathroom the entire time we were in India.
Well uh that doesn't surprise me, ya i bought these at Rudy's. It's a used clothing store. See when people like you die, the widows they bring in their wardrobes, they make a bundle.
He was always such a goof-off. I mean did he ever get anywhere?
Maybe they should get together. [mind] Go ahead. Kiss her. I'm a baseball player dammit.
I don't understand. Before you were jealous of me. Now you're jealous of him?
Jerry, I just need your signature here, and we'll get you that yellow car ready to go.
I showered! Oh, wait a second... Since I showered, I've been in the car!
